com.aluxian.butler.database.models

Class ChitChatQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.activeandroid.Model
      • com.aluxian.butler.database.PatternModel
        • com.aluxian.butler.database.models.ChitChatQuestion

  • public class ChitChatQuestion
extends PatternModel
    The ChitChatQuestion model stores a pattern that will be matches against user input.

    If the pattern matches, then one of the ChitChatAnswers corresponding to the ChitChatQuestion will be spoken by the assistant.

    ChitChatQuestion objects are not necessarily questions, they can be any user input.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      ChitChatAnswer answer
      This question will only be matched for this answer
